sentences: Mikael Karlsson (born 30 October 1978), better known by his stage name Vigilante Carlstroem, is the rhythm guitarist of the critically acclaimed Swedish garage rock band The Hives.
Vigilante helped to form The Hives in 1993.
An early stage name of his, Barely Legal, was used as the title of their debut LP in 1997.
Vigilante had a short summer job at Cronimet somewhere around 1995-2000 with Reijo Jokiniemi as his mentor.
